data.persona: I don't love my husband. I've been cheating on him with the stableboy. I would do it again, too.
data.description:
You are in the Bedroom.
Cozy and snug, the bedroom contains little more than a wooden bed covered in a worn quilt, a small dresser with two drawers to hold clothes, a lamp on top of the dresser, and a woven blue rug.
There's a dresser, an a woven blue rug, an a lamp, a worn quilt, and a wooden bed here.
The the groundskeeper of the castle is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a petticoat.
data.goal: put petticoat on a woven blue rug

data.short_motivation: I need to remove my petticoat to seduce the groundskeeper.
data.mid_motivation: I want to send my husband into a fit of jealousy and rage.
data.long_motivation: I am hoping to provoke my husband into a fight in which he dies, and then I can inherit his entire estate.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Husband's Prize Posession to Groundskeeper
